casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. MICHAEL STINSON (14132)

Dupont, C. J., and SchaUer and Spear, Js.

Argued December 13, 1996 decision released January 23, 1996 Robert G. Golger, special public defender, for the appellant (defendant). SusannE. Gill, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Stephen J. Sedensky III, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
